name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Today is the first anniversary of the Urumqi fire incident. Netizens submitted the latest news about the community one year later.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 23, a video circulated online showed that a man in Longgang, Shenzhen was subdued by a group of policemen because he was suspected of being drunk. During the subduing process, a policeman secretly tried to break the ankle of the subdued man.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 23, in the Fever Department of the Xiasha Branch of the Run Run Shaw Hospital in Hangzhou, Zhejiang, there were constant coughing sounds and everyone was slumped in their chairs with haggard faces.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
In the early morning of November 24, the screen in the emergency hall of Tianjin Children's Hospital showed that the number of children waiting for treatment had reached more than 1,000.
On November 20, more than 700 children were waiting in line for treatment at a hospital in Beijing.
Children can be seen doing homework while receiving intravenous drips in hospitals across the country. Some hospitals even set up a "homework area".
Netizens exclaimed: This is simply a modern version of "not leaving the front line even if you are slightly injured."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 24, China National Radio reported that in the past week, respiratory syncytial virus ranked third in the outpatient ranking. Syncytial virus is transmitted through droplets and close contact or through contaminated hands and surfaces. Both children and adults may be infected. 
Currently, there is no particularly effective drug for treatment.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: China announced that it will unilaterally exempt citizens of Italy, Germany, France, the Netherlands, Spain and Malaysia from visas starting from December 1

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 24, Jinan, Shandong.
China Railway 21st Bureau has been in arrears of wages for workers for more than half a year. On that day, a large number of workers blocked the company's gate to demand their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 23, a netizen posted a video online recording his experience of drug testing in the past two years.
The netizen had no income due to the lockdown of the city due to the epidemic, so he was forced to embark on the road of drug testing. At present, the netizen has been engaged in the drug testing industry for two years and has done as many as 14 projects.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 23, in Henan, a man said in a live broadcast that he used to work in a bank, and later passed the civil service examination. His current monthly salary is only 2,074 yuan, and he does not receive any bonuses or benefits.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The driver of the bus suffered a sudden illness, resulting in 1 death and 2 injuries.
At 7:23 on November 24, a bus collided at the Nanqiao Bus Station in Fengxian, Shanghai. A bus driver (male, 50 years old) suddenly fell ill and fainted while driving (with no passengers on the bus) into the station, causing the vehicle to collide with two other buses (empty buses) in the station, and causing a waiting entrance to be damaged, causing skin injuries to two waiting passengers.
At present, the driver died after being sent to the hospital for rescue.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 24, the WeChat public account "Yixuebao" published an article saying that a student fell from a building at the Taijiang campus of Fujian Medical University. Afterwards, the article and topic quickly became a hot search topic.
The article said that before the student fell from the building, he complained to his friends that his research progress was limited and that it was difficult to graduate.
In response, a staff member of the Discipline Inspection Commission of Fujian Medical University said that the student was a student of the school and died after failed rescue efforts. The cause of the student's fall is still under investigation

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 23, Jinan, Shandong.
In Luqiao Village, Taiping Street, villagers were dissatisfied with the compensation for demolition given by the government. On that day, a large number of villagers gathered together to protest and prevented the demolition team from entering the village.
During the period, fierce conflicts broke out with the police who were maintaining stability. Someone could be heard shouting at the scene: The police station beat people!

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 24, the Beijing No. 3 Intermediate People's Court publicly pronounced the verdict on Wu Yifan's appeal, ruling to dismiss the appeal and uphold the original verdict.
Then the account "20XXCLUB" posted a message in response to Wu Yifan's second trial. The message in the picture said, "I am Wu Yifan's mother. I believe in Chinese law. Even if the second trial is over, I will still appeal for my son." It also stated that there was a phenomenon of inducing and forcing confessions from the victim during the interrogation process.
The article has been deleted and the relevant pictures have been blocked.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It is reported that "20XXCLUB" was Wu Yifan's former music label, and the account authentication entity is Tianjin Fanshi Culture Media Co., Ltd., whose legal representative is Wu Yifan's cousin.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
According to insiders,
Currently, as the first anniversary of the White Paper Movement is approaching, Nanjing University of Communication has begun to be on alert.
At the same time, the school has adopted a "one-to-one" strategy for students who participated in the White Paper Movement last year, and each person has a special student to watch over them.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 23, a female graduate student at the School of Fine Arts of Jiangsu Normal University jumped from the sixth floor, reportedly due to emotional issues.
On the 24th, her family went to the school to place wreaths.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Beijing

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 24, media reported that Zhoukou, Henan Province, implemented a policy of "college students paying provident fund". College students who prepay 1,008 yuan per month and make deposits for more than six months can enjoy a preferential policy with a loan limit of 600,000 yuan within five years after graduation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: User contribution: Current situation map

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 24, in Changchun, Jilin, the Municipal Bureau of Culture and Tourism called a halt to all comic exhibitions.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In a primary school in Zhengzhou, Henan Province, teachers were tasked with collectively falsifying students' physical fitness test scores because they were generally poor.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, the media reported that four years ago, a township government in Xinyang, Henan invited a company to build an ecological forest. Four years later, it said that the company had illegally used the land and sent people to cut down the trees.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, a woman in Xuanwei, Yunnan was criticized and fined 200 yuan for insulting the public security law enforcement department on Douyin.
It is reported that the woman had a long-term conflict with her family and had called the police for this, but was dissatisfied with the result. Recently, she and her family quarreled over an economic dispute, so she made inappropriate remarks on the "Douyin" platform, and even insulted the public security law enforcement department, which attracted a large number of netizens to browse and comment.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 23, Liangliang Lijun posted on Weibo: "I used to study history, and now I am experiencing history." She also said that she didn't understand why all her accounts except Weibo were banned. A few minutes later, Liangliang Lijun's Weibo was also banned.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 23, a blogger said that when he passed through Serbian customs, he was harassed and demanded a bribe by customs officials, and the officials snatched his mobile phone and prevented him from recording videos.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Reviews

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, the media reported that the designated skipping rope for the Hangzhou high school entrance examination costs 78 yuan, but parents found that the same type of skipping rope online only costs a dozen yuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 24, a student at Shanghai Jiaotong University said that he found a 1.5-cm-long needle in his food in the cafeteria. The school responded that the newborn pig was stubborn during vaccination and the needle broke in the bone.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 17, it was reported online that the second-year students of Lishui High School in Zhejiang Province launched a protest. The second-year students were dissatisfied because the school announced that they would deprive the second-year students of the "big weekend" holiday. Students from two key classes wrote slogans criticizing the school and school leaders on the test papers, and connected them into a long scroll, which was passed from the sixth floor to the second floor. In the end, the school compromised, and several students were criticized in the notice.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @St4nTsu1 You (pause) can live in China (pause, squint) during (pause) high school, so just be happy.
